text: Atapaka is a village in Kaikaluru mandal of Krishna district, Andhra Pradesh, India. ==Demographics== According to Indian census, 2001, the demographic details of Atapaka mandal is as follows:Atapaka village at Our Village India.org * Total Population: 4,883 in 1,144 Households * Male Population: 2,453 and Female Population: 2,430 * Children Under 6-years of age: 655 (Boys - and Girls - 331) * Total Literates: 3,035 ==Eminent persons== * Banda Kanakalingeshwara Rao, famous Telugu drama and film actor was born here. ==References== Category:Villages in Krishna district
title: Atapaka
